CustomField.formula: IF ( OR ( CONTAINS(Name_of_Child__c, "Baby"), CONTAINS(Name_of_Child__c, "Twin"), CONTAINS(Name_of_Child__c, "UNA"), CONTAINS(Name_of_Child__c, "Unknown"), CONTAINS(Name_of_Child__c, "Female"), ISBLANK(Name_of_Child__c)), null, LEFT( Name_of_Child__c ,FIND(" ", Name_of_Child__c,1)-1))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns only the first name upto the first space in the full name of child field.
CustomField.label: Baby First Name
